alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 06 at 8:19PM MDT until July 06 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NATRONA AND SOUTHEASTERN JOHNSON COUNTIES... At 819 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Teapot Rock, which is also 27 miles south of Kaycee, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Midwest, Edgerton and Teapot Rock. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 209 and 236. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
